verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God is so good, hallelujah, God is so good, hallelujah, God is so good, He’s so good to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love Him so, hallelujah, I love Him so, hallelujah, I love Him so, He’s so good to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He answers prayer, hallelujah, He answers prayer, hallelujah, He answers prayer, He’s so good to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s coming back, hallelujah, He’s coming back, hallelujah, He’s coming back, He’s so good to me.{/lang-eng}
